rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open space with minimalistic design to allow for natural light and air circulation, following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open area with eco-friendly materials and large windows for passive solar heating. Placement is oriented to maximize sunlight during morning hours.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with natural light and cross ventilation. Materials are sustainable bamboo or reclaimed wood.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Energy-efficient kitchen with eco-friendly appliances and open layout to promote air flow. North-east facing for auspiciousness per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Balcony (attached to Bedroom 1)
rooms.description: Spacious balcony providing private outdoor space with greenery and water element installations for a calming environment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Master bedroom with south-west facing orientation to ensure relaxation. Equipped with eco-friendly LED lighting and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Balcony (attached to Bedroom 2)
rooms.description: Well-designed balcony enhancing the master bedroom's aesthetic while offering fresh air and a view of the garden.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Guest bedroom with east-facing orientation for positive energy flow and sunlight in the morning, complemented by sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Balcony (attached to Bedroom 3)
rooms.description: Private balcony providing a serene outdoor space for additional guest room usage.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with north-west facing orientation to promote tranquility and optimal energy circulation.

rooms.name: Balcony (attached to Bedroom 4)
rooms.description: Spacious balcony enhancing the ambiance of this bedroom with natural light and ventilation options.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom designed to maximize relaxation and comfort with eco-friendly finishes and Vastu-compliant positioning.

rooms.name: Balcony (attached to Bedroom 5)
rooms.description: Additional balcony offering outdoor leisure space for bedroom 5.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Fifth bedroom with south-east facing orientation to harness positive energy and optimal sunlight distribution.

rooms.name: Balcony (attached to Bedroom 6)
rooms.description: Final balcony offering privacy and a relaxing outdoor setting for the sixth bedroom.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: Sixth bedroom designed with eco-friendly materials and Vastu principles in mind to create a harmonious living space.

openings.description: Energy-efficient door with insulated glass for enhanced thermal performance.
Large windows designed to maximize natural light and passive solar heating.
Strategically placed window ensuring cross ventilation in the kitchen area.
